name: Calling Into Reality
description:
Calling Into Reality is a game that we made for the Mini Jame Gam, a game jam in which we had 58 hours to create a game revolving around the theme “Reality is Breaking” and including the special object “Telephone.” You are the last of the group known as the “Byte Walkers” who were test subjects being forced to explore alternate realities. In order to do so, you have to call an agent to open up a portal and let you cross between realities. You are tasked with finding and extracting an ancient technology that may have the proper malware to destroy part of the cyber-anomaly.

HOW TO PLAY 

(some spoilers on mechanics, so try to figure it out in-game before referring to this):

a - left

d - right

space - jump

shift - open portal

Hint: plan out how you are going to move stuff around before getting stuck

Programmers: Morgan McCloud and Dylan Schneiderman

aka GameZgirl and MSixteenI6

Tilemap (recolored) by bluematt on itch.io

Font by Typodermic Fonts on dafont.com

Portal sfx by Slava Pogorelsky on zapsplat.com

Dialogue made with the help of the dialogic plugin for godot

Laser sfx by aust_paul on freesound.org

Background Music from Joystock.org

Sprites and background art created and animated by us

Everything else was either created by us, or gotten freely from someone with no need for accreditation
